content: post stitches and bobbles add texture to this square make your version 6 or 12 this square is part of the you ve got options crochet along with cal central 1 **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** the free version is supported by advertising on my website the downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry includes the full pattern in one printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch treble triple crochet crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop only skipping stitches crocheting in chain spaces special stitches bob fpdc fpsc with written instructions and linked video tutorials in pattern **skill level** intermediate **finished sizes** motif through round 7 = 6 15 cm through round 14 = 12 30 5 cm **materials** lion brand crayola cake yarn 100% acrylic 3 oz/85 g 177 yd/162 m 1 skein in 605n aquamarine *or approximately 150 yd/137 m of any medium weight yarn * us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** through round 7 = 6 15 cm in pattern *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2020/01/06/youve-got-options-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2020/01/13/circle-in-a-square-crochet-motif-bumpy-ride-square/
